title: [SOLVED]2010 MacBook Pro Gpu capacitor
message:
Hi doing first real logic board component repair.
Replaced capacitor using schematic and your video.
now MacBook Pro 15 2010 in constant reboot.
am I using the wrong part? I believe th cap is proper  orientation.
Thanks!
Newbie Rick

title: [SOLVED]2010 MacBook Pro Gpu capacitor
message: It looks ok and looks the right way round. I think that you've knocked off R5413 which is a current sensing double resistor which is normally present (at least on the boards i've done this to) to the bottom left of the replaced cap in your picture.

title: [SOLVED]2010 MacBook Pro Gpu capacitor
message: Thanks I dint take a picture before hand, but it does look like a part belongs there. I'll check my schematic.

title: [SOLVED]2010 MacBook Pro Gpu capacitor
message: Resistor is indeed gone. Do not use hot air for these repairs. Now there is a big chance the balls under the CPU reflowed too....

title: [SOLVED]2010 MacBook Pro Gpu capacitor
message:
Hi Duke,
Thanks for the advice much  appreciated.
I left the heat sync on to protect the chips. Hope the solder under the CPU is ok. 
Ill check the schematic to find what resistor to replace it with.  R5413

title: [SOLVED]2010 MacBook Pro Gpu capacitor
message:
Hi Duke
I did a search for the R5413 on other logic boards I have and it comes back with a single resistor. 
Can this be ordered off mouser? or is there a substitute search or parts?
Thanks

title: [SOLVED]2010 MacBook Pro Gpu capacitor
message: You look for a 0.001 Ohm sense resistor, boards are full of them. R5413 is just a number....

title: [SOLVED]2010 MacBook Pro Gpu capacitor
message: are my eyes going bad or does that cap look a little small for not being a tant cap?

title: [SOLVED]2010 MacBook Pro Gpu capacitor
message:
Hi Duke,
I asume capacitors will read 1 direction and not the other.
Resistors are Black in color? Caps areBrown or do I have to use schematics.
Using Fluke meter but hard to hold component steady without it flying away.

Thanks

title: [SOLVED]2010 MacBook Pro Gpu capacitor
message: What are you trying to do? It is not hard to find a 0.001 Ohm sense resistor on a schematic and take it off a board. Take any scrap board and find sense resistors, then look in schematic if it is the same value as R5413.

title: [SOLVED]2010 MacBook Pro Gpu capacitor
message:
Got it now cause I know what the resistor looks like now.
Your right quite a few on parts board.
Thanks Much Duke!
